"Fyne": "Good work! That was some nice fighting! You and Manon both, the Meteorn lately have been mighty fast learners."
"When you learn a new Photon Art, remember what I taught you!"
"When you learn a new Technique, remember what I taught you!"
"When you learn a new Photon Art or Technique, remember what I taught you!"
"Here, take this. It'll heal you up good as new."
"Make good use of what I taught you, okay?"
"Oh, that reminds me. There was someone looking to talk to you."
"He's called Bosey. He should be out in front of the fountain right now."
